resources.string: Coin Flip: Click on \"Flip Coin\" button in the main menu. If there are children configured, the app will show the child\'s name whose turn it is or user can do a random flip if no child is configured. Then the user selects either heads or tails and click the \"Flip Coin\" button to flip. The app will show the result of flip which is automatically saved in the flip history that user can view anytime.

Timeout: Click on \"Timeout\" button in the main menu.App asks for user input for timer. User can select one of the timer options or create a custom timer by entering time(only positive integers allowed) and click on \"Start Timer\" button, starts the timer. User can pause, resume or reset(allows to start again or cancel) the timer. User can close the app, while timer runs in the background. When timer is done, app will show a notification from where the user can stop the alarm sound.

Configure Child: Click on \"Children\" button in main menu. If there are children already configured the app will show the list of children. To add a new child, click on the \"\+\" icon in the toolbar. Enter the name of the child and click on \"Save\" button to save it. User can click on the child\'s name to edit or delete it. History related to the deleted child will be removed.
